definition: to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP), Canadian federal and national police force/Mounties
mounted police detachment (on horse or motorbike)

sentences.english: The RCMP said its investigation is continuing.
sentences.chinese: 皇家骑警称调查正在继续。

sentences.english: Speaking of Mounties, they do not all ride horses.
sentences.chinese: 谈到皇家骑警，他们并不总是骑在马上。

sentences.english: Elsewhere, police on horseback worked to control the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 在其他地方，则有骑警在控制人群。
皇家骑警的一名代表拒绝置评。

sentences.english: Mounted police are police who do patrols on horseback or camelback.
sentences.chinese: 骑警指在骑马或骑骆驼执行巡逻任务的警察。

sentences.english: The Mounties are quick to respond to a call for help .
sentences.chinese: 皇家骑警对求救电话响应迅速。

sentences.english: The forerunner of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (Mounties), the Northwest Mounted Police, kept the peace.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大皇家骑警的前身，西北骑警，维持了和平。

sentences.english: The forerunner of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (Mounties), the Northwest Mounted Police, kept the peace.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大皇家骑警的前身，西北骑警，维持了和平。

sentences.english: The trooper agreed to let him stay put.
sentences.chinese: 骑警同意让他呆在原处不动。

sentences.english: Then the Royal Canadian Mounted Police pour out of vans and from around the corner.
sentences.chinese: 大批的加拿大皇家骑警从车后和角落里现身出来。

sentences.english: In the melee that followed, a policeman on horseback knocked out two of Apotheker's teeth.
sentences.chinese: 后来在一片混乱中，被骑警打掉了两颗牙齿。

sentences.english: The bullet just shaved the Mountie's cheek.
sentences.chinese: 子弹擦着皇家骑警的脸颊飞过。

sentences.english: Mounties raked the district for a trace of the missing men .
sentences.chinese: 皇家骑警在管区内认真搜寻失踪人员的踪迹。

definition: mounted police detachment (on horse or motorbike)
SWAT (Special Weapons And Tactics)/riot police/abbr. for 特種警察|特种警察[te4 zhong3 jing3 cha2]
to be on duty (of a security guard etc)
traffic police/abbr. for 交通警察
special duty (e.g. extra security or traffic control on special occasions)/person on special duty
group/a large body of/production brigade/military group
variant of 執勤|执勤[zhi2 qin2]
